I use the car as a family car. Run in villages and small contry roads. Very good comfort and good handling. I have covered 900 km on stretch with fully loaded car. Still very good comfort. Got an average of 17.5 per km when I take trip from nagpur to vaishnodevi via delhi gurgaon and that too in hot scorching summer with full ac on and speed always above 100 kmphr. I am happy.

It has been only six months and the car is driven around 3000 km. The experience is quite nice, though the car is mostly seen used by cab aggregators, but it still a good option for the family. Interestingly, the car offers good comfort and has a decently well driving dynamics.
